Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Narragansett/Montrose
ShortDescription: Southbound 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, Montrose Neenah (Wright College), and Narragansett.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, Montrose Neenah (Wright College), and Narragansett, due to street blockage near Narragansett/Montrose.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
